nodes.bodyText:
Great work @serpens24.
Can you please use the GridChoice enums instead of the String?
Can you please use the GridChoice enums instead of the String?
Hi, I will make these changes. I wasnt aware of the GridChoice enums.
Since this is one of our most used arrangements, rather than change it i'd suggest making an ArrangeInGridGeneralAction to run alongside it.

Sorry - I dont understand, are you suggesting having 2 grid arrangements in the menu ?
If so, I would think that would cause confusion to the end user.... I thought both arrangmements were effectively the same to the end user but there may be some subleties I'm missing ?

Sorry, it was late. GRID_GENERAL is a generalised version of GRID_COMPOSITE (which should be GRID_COMPONENTS?), so as long as you're defaulting to all the same default parameter values they should be equivalent. So long as that's the case we can merge this in, and probably delete GRID_COMPOSITE.
Ahh yep... that was the basic theory I originally had .. but found I couldn't just delete COMPOSITE/COMPONENTS as its used in a heap of other places... so figure we cant delete GRID_COMPOSITE.

OK - as discussed in the meeting today, we wont remove GRID_COMPOSITE under this PR, as its a standalone issue .. I'll raise a ticket for that, and as such I beleive this PR can be completed @arcturus2
